children.text: DataSource state contains the current state of the displayed data: range of records to be displayed from some position, an index to be scrolled to, an index of a focused row, a search string, specified filter value, sorting configuration, selected rows ids, folded rows ids, current page, and page size.
It is usually held in the component's state. Changing the DataSource state causes a change of rows, which are displayed (returned by DataSource).
